Ingredients.2: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.3: 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste

Ingredients.6: 2 tablespoons chopped Italian flat leaf parsley

Ingredients.10: 1 teaspoon chopped Italian flat leaf parsley

Directions.1: Place a heavy skillet over medium heat. Pour cream into skillet, bring to a simmer, and cook cream until it reduces by half, about 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Season with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.

Directions.2: Bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Pour dried ravioli into boiling water and cook, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender, 16 to 18 minutes. Drain pasta, reserving a cup of pasta water.

Directions.3: Gently fold cooked ravioli into cream sauce and turn heat to low. Mix in Gorgonzola cheese, stirring gently until melted. If sauce is too thick, thin it with a little pasta cooking water.

Directions.4: Stir in 2 tablespoons parsley and Parmesan cheese. Transfer to a serving bowl and sprinkle with diced apple, walnuts, and 1 teaspoon parsley.
